mapper.update: UPDATE SL_EP_CAP SET LAB_AREA=#{labArea}, LAB_FUNCTION=#{labFunction}, LAB_INVESTMENT=#{labInvestment}, LAB_MEMBER=#{labMember}, DD_EQUIPMENT=#{ddEquipment}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER + 1 WHERE EP_ID=#{epId}
mapper.select: select EP_ID AS epId from SL_EP_CAP where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId}
